item.description:
First Annual CT Vegetarian
& Healthy Living Festival

Sunday April 29, 2012

Free entry with donation of a non-perishable vegan/vegetarian food item. This event is dedicated to heightening the awareness of: the benefits of living a healthy cruelty-free lifestyle, and the benefits to animals, to the environment and ourselves. (Volunteers needed! ... see more info below.)

Join us for a day or exploration and education...

  • Learn ways to ensure a healthy planet
  • Experience tasty vegan/vegetarian food samples
  • Shop for cruelty-free personal care products
  • Discover new yoga, reiki and other holistic health practices
  • Attend lectures, cooking & wellness demonstrations
  • View a special screening of the film Vegucated
  • Enter to win hundreds of raffle and door prizes


For more info:

Read the press release

Visit the website: www.CTVegFest.com

Contact the organizer: Ani Tirpan, 203.404.3164, ani@CTVegFest.org

CTVegFest is in need of volunteers during the festival!
Use the volunteer sign up form online to register to help.

The exhibitor application is also available on the website under Exhibitors.
item.name: CT Vegetarian & Healthy Living Festival
